  • You will see an informative graphical indicator of target training heart rate zones;
  • You will also see information about calorie consumption during the workout;

customer reviews

Irina Ivanchenko
2 half marathons
I didn’t know what to buy for myself, so I turned to the guys from RunSmart - they selected a heart rate monitor that suited my goals and financial capabilities. After some time, I decided to update the gadget - without hesitation I went there.

New goals - new gadget!

Thanks!
Ivan Freedom
1 half marathons
Cool thing - heart rate monitor. I usually ran without them. It turns out I only made things worse for myself. I bought a heart rate monitor and received a workout as a gift. They held my first training session together and taught me how to use a new gadget. They also explained the basics of anatomy and made a training plan for the month ahead.

I prepared for my first half marathon with them! Thank you!!!
Zaryna Volya
2 half marathons
It took me a long time to start running because... I started several times before, but it became difficult and I quit. I heard about RunSmart and running with heart rate control from friends and decided to try it.

I called, the guys asked about my goals and found a very interesting option with a discount! Now I run and enjoy running! I’ve already run 2 half marathons and several shorter races and don’t intend to stop!

Thanks!
Velika Vasylkivska, 55, Kyiv, 02000
